title: Survey-Based Analysis Process for Exploring University Students' Learning and Teaching Conceptions

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Learners assume roles as pre-service teachers or job seekers in secondary education settings, participating in research from the perspective of potential instructors in higher education environments.

learning_goals: Learners will explicitly describe at least three of their own implicit teaching-learning beliefs about university education.
Learners will analyze peer groups' learning beliefs using survey design and statistical analysis methods.
Learners will produce project outcomes that reflect their instructional design direction based on research findings.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
